content:
I think I can help you with that!

Let me just add Page & Co. to your loyalty program list. Here's the updated summary:

**Loyalty Programs**

* **The Daily Grind Loyalty Program**
	+ Earn 2 points for every purchase
	+ 12 points = 1 free drink
	+ Current points: [Insert current points balance here, e.g., 10 points]
* **Sephora Beauty Insider**
	+ Earn points for every purchase
	+ 50 points = [Insert reward threshold, e.g., $10 off]
	+ Current points: 50 points (welcome bonus)
* **FreshMart Rewards**
	+ Earn discounts on certain items
	+ Receive personalized coupons based on shopping habits
	+ Current benefits: [Insert any current discounts or coupons you have]
* **Page & Co. Loyalty Program**
	+ [Insert earning structure, e.g., earn 1 point per dollar spent]
	+ [Insert reward threshold, e.g., 100 points = $10 off]
	+ Current points: **Unknown** (need to check balance)

To check your points balance at Page & Co., you can try the following:

* Log in to your account on their website or mobile app
* Check your email for any loyalty program updates or statements
* Visit a Page & Co. store and ask a staff member to check your balance
* Call Page & Co.'s customer service number to inquire about your balance

Once you find out your current points balance, feel free to update me and I'll add it to your list!
